product_name: ClarinsDOUBLE SERUM Eye Firming & Hydrating Concentrate
summary: SummaryHighlightsVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackClarins Double Serum Eye Firming & Hydrating Concentrate is a two in one formula with 13 plant extracts that combines into one powerhouse eye treatment to visibly smooth, firm and hydrate for more youthful-looking eyes in just 7 days.* *Satisfaction test - multi-ethnic panel - 375 women - 7 days.
details: DetailsBenefitsVisibly firms skin to smooth the look of fine lines and wrinklesDeeply nourishes and hydratesVisibly reduces puffiness and dark circlesIlluminates the eye areaRevitalizes the delicate skin around eyesKey IngredientsTurmeric + Organic Wild Chervil: revitalize the delicate eye area and visibly reduces signs of eye agingOrganic Oat: sugars visibly tighten and smoothOrganic Leaf of Life: powers the skin's natural hydrationHorse Chestnut Escin: boosts radiance and visibly reduces dark circlesPlant-based Caffeine: visibly reduces puffy eyesGinger Lily Extract: fights skin-aging free radicalsOrganic White Horehound, Nipplewort and Furcellaria Extracts: help protect skin from indoor and outdoor pollution, including damaging blue lights from electronicsVegetal Squalane: supports the skin's hydrolipidic filmItem 2592792How To UseApply to clean eye contours, morning and evening.Turn the rotating push button to dispense the desired amount. Mix both phases between fingertips. Apply temple-to-temple, gently pressing over the upper and lower eyelids-from the inner corners of the eyes, out to the hairline. Tap gently between eyebrows.Follow with Double Serum to address all visible signs of skin and eye aging.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Propanediol, Glycerin, Squalane, Boron Nitride, Caffeine, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Caprylyl / Capryl Glucoside, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate, Co- Polymer, 1,2-Hexanediol, Parfum/Fragrance, Pentylene Glycol, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Ppg-26-Buteth-26, Escin, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil Unsaponifiables, Disodium Edta, Peg-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Vp Copolymer, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Caramel, Butylene Glycol, Actinidia Chinensis (Kiwi) Fruit Extract, Kalan- Choe Pinnata Leaf Extract, Sodium Hydroxide, Marrubium Vulgare Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Anthriscus Sylvestris Extract, Hedychium Coronarium Root Extract, T-Butyl Alcohol, Citric Acid, Phenethyl Alcohol, Furcellaria Lumbricalis Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Maris Sal/Sea Salt/Sel Marin, Lap- Sana Communis Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract [V3818A].Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply to clean eye contours, morning and evening.Turn the rotating push button to dispense the desired amount. Mix both phases between fingertips. Apply temple-to-temple, gently pressing over the upper and lower eyelids-from the inner corners of the eyes, out to the hairline. Tap gently between eyebrows.Follow with Double Serum to address all visible signs of skin and eye aging.

reviews.headline: Fantastic!
reviews.comments: Love the feel and really helps! I like the controlled dispenser

reviews.headline: Love Love this eye serum
reviews.comments: This is the first item I've tried from Clarins.  It soaks in immediately and definitely does as described.  I am so pleased with how well it works that I'm going to try some of their other products.

reviews.headline: Unsure
reviews.comments: Used this in combination with the Total Eye Lift and my eyes puffed up with irritation and skin peeling or scaling.  I will use alone once my skin heals.  I really, really want to like this product and find a  mature skincare routine now that I'm heading into my mid 50s

reviews.headline: Good product for eye area
reviews.comments: Favorably Compares to more expensive eye serums.

reviews.headline: Good serum but bad dispenser
reviews.comments: I liked the serum but the dispenser needs to be re-done.  The first thing that happened was it stopped dispensing the cream in the middle and would only dispenser the clear serum. Then it stopped working altogether. Still have a decent amount of product in the bottle that I can't get out. it's been awhile since I bought it,  so probably can't return it, but will have to take a hammer or a screwdriver to the bottle to be able to use it up. Too expensive to deal with that hassle.

reviews.headline: Great eye serum
reviews.comments: A little goes a long ways, but I've definitely noticed that it helps with fine lines and wrinkles under my eyes. I absolutely love this product.

reviews.headline: Meh.. don't waste your $
reviews.comments: First of all the pump sucks. The actual product is not great either. I cannot tell the difference in my skin if I use it or don't use it. I'm sure it has some moisturizing benefits, but they are very minimal at best, not sure what im missing here. To me this is very overpriced for what you get

reviews.headline: Save your money
reviews.comments: I want to know how this has 4 stars. Its ok. I've been using it for 2 months now.

reviews.headline: Meh
reviews.comments: Its ok. Dont see significant enough results to warrant the price.

reviews.headline: Great
reviews.comments: This is a light weight eye serum that absorbs quickly

reviews.headline: Great for hydration!
reviews.comments: I love how this product makes my eyes feel. Very hydrating and my wrinkles-well doesnt even look like I have any-but it did nothing for under eye bags.

reviews.headline: Not worth the hype
reviews.comments: I found the product was sticky and did not absorb well on my skin. I returned it after 2 uses.

reviews.headline: Nice application
reviews.comments: I love how smooth it goes on.

reviews.headline: Jury is still outâ€¦
reviews.comments: The dispenser on this product is awful.  There are two settings, but both pump out way too much with each use.  The serum itself feels lovely and slides on nicely.  Unlike other reviews, I did not notice an off putting or strong fragrance.  I have not seen a noticeable enough difference to recommend this over other products that are easier to moderate usage.

reviews.headline: Effective eye cream
reviews.comments: Ive used multiple eye creams that haven't felt like they do much for my under eyes but this is one product that actually makes a difference. I have dark circles and want firmer skin and this has helped in the texture and appearance of those dark cirles. There is a bit of fragrance in this one tho so if you prefer non-scented products go for their eye cream in the red container. It works just as good!

reviews.headline: Not even distribution
reviews.comments:
Not for me . Have used many high 
Love clarins products but unfortunately , this one is a definate no for me

reviews.headline: Great texture
reviews.comments: I like the combination of the two products. Made skin around my eyes feel soothed and moisturized well.

reviews.headline: Loved it
reviews.comments: The feel of the product is great, its not oily. Absorbs into my skin quickly. I liked the smell of it.

reviews.headline: The best
reviews.comments: I started using it for under eye puffiness and it works so well it's part of my daily regimen.

media.headline: Same product comes out both dials
media.caption: Eye serum

faceoff_positive.comments: Clarins must have read my mind because I was thinking it would be nice to have a serum for my eyes. as I really like the Double Serum for my face.  And, now I have been using their Double Eye Serum for a couple weeks and really like it. I like all of Clarins's skin care products. I also like being a member of Clarins, because they sent me a Holiday Gift!!!! I was really surprised and thought it was a really nice gesture! Just in case you're wondering what it was, it was a good size eye make up remover, a good size sample of their eye cream and reusable pads to remove the make up plus a little pouch. It is very nice and very much appreciated. I've been using Clarins for over 25 years and expect to continue to do so. Take care of your skin!!!!! Beautiful skin is within your reach, just use Clarins consistently like I do.
faceoff_positive.headline: Eye Serum

faceoff_negative.comments: The first time I bought this from my local department store and set the dispenser to the smaller amount. When it got lower it still had quite a lot of oil left but no white substance. I spoke to the Clarins rep at the store and she suggested that I needed to make sure the dispenser setting was exactly on the label. I bought a second lot and checked it was on the setting every time I used it. Same thing happened. I won't be buying this again (which is a shame as I like it) and I will be taking back to my local rep to complain. It's expensive and I can't use it all up, so I feel I'm being ripped off by Clarins with this product.
faceoff_negative.headline: Disappointed with dispenser
